divs: Sighting DetailsI was working overnight security and had observed a white ball of light about half the size of a full moon.It was in the tree line bordering a swap next to the front parking lot.I then began watching it the other guy who was working thought it was nothing but i realized right away that it was moving in all directions even going in to the trees which would require it to change size as well.After a few weeks i had finally convinced him that it did move and that it was not normal so we then decided to investigate.We grabed a large spotlight and flashed the object from the closest point of the parking lot.The other guy yelled something at it this is when it came right to us in the blink of an eye.And hovered 6 feat in front of us about two stories in the sky neither of us moved or spoke untill it flew up in a diagnal line went a way and at high speed but didnt just fly away it was like they vanished anyway thats it .I never told any one but friends and family untill know and thought it might be helpfull as ive found no accounts any where of some one getting these things which im not sure are aliens or ufo's to come and get up close and personal.
Summary: i saw a ball of light of weeks in trees then me and a friend spotlihted it and it came to us.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Holly
There were no other sightings in Holly on or around July 10th 2004
